comments:
Selecting the "Restore Default Value" from the property sheet view while 
editing an entry in the logic example (e.g. Location->X) causes a null pointer 
exception.  The exception is in UndoablePropertySheetEntry and is caused by 
the "stack" member variable being null.

The stack trace is as follows:
